title: Offbeat
body:
The Offbeat category is essentially a blank space - the Free Parking of FreeSO. Right now there are not yet any benefits for this property category, though propreties with this category usually try to bring something different to the city, and entertain the players rather than the sims. If a property in this category is popular, you know it's for a good reason. 

Motives: [s][color=#B3FF99]Easy[/color][/s], Speciality: [s]Nothing... Yet![/s]
